gen:link.label:label: BV1201: In case no ECAI has been nominated and a simplification is being used to calculate the SCR, the item "Credit quality step" should be reported as Credit quality step 2 or 3 due to article 176a for unrated bonds and loans or Credit quality step 3 due to simplified calculation under article 105a of Delegated Regulation 2015/35. -->Template 1: S.06.02; Expression: If {c0330} = [s2c_SE:x187] then {c0340} = [s2c_BR:x30] or {c0340} = [s2c_BR:x31] or {c0340} = [s2c_BR:x32]

BV1201: In case no ECAI has been nominated and a simplification is being used to calculate the SCR, the item "Credit quality step" should be reported as Credit quality step 2 or 3 due to article 176a for unrated bonds and loans or Credit quality step 3 due to simplified calculation under article 105a of Delegated Regulation 2015/35. -->Template 1: S.06.02; Expression: If {c0330} = [s2c_SE:x187] then {c0340} = [s2c_BR:x30] or {c0340} = [s2c_BR:x31] or {c0340} = [s2c_BR:x32]
